Passaic.First Reformed Dutch Church, Hackensack:
First Dutch Reformed Church, also known as the "Old Church on the Green", is located in Hackensack, New Jersey.


== History ==
It sits in the churchyard of the church by the same name, the current building being constructed in 1791. The east wall of the building is of particular interest because it incorporates several carved stones from the first church building erected on the site.
